title: Elbow Pain Regenerative Programme
description: Targeted PRP, tenotomy, and rehab to heal tennis elbow, golfer’s elbow, and stubborn forearm tendinopathy.
longDescription: Repetitive strain, racquet sports, or long hours at a desk can inflame elbow tendons. Our programme combines ultrasound-guided PRP or micro-tenotomy with eccentric strengthening so pain fades, grip returns, and you can lift, type, or play without flare-ups.

overview.title: How We Heal Elbow Tendons
overview.content: We map tendon damage with ultrasound, then deliver PRP or perform micro-needling tenotomy to break down scar tissue and stimulate healing. Rehab focuses on eccentric loading, grip strength, and posture so results last.
highlights: Treats tennis elbow, golfer’s elbow, distal biceps tendinopathy

faq.question: How soon can I return to sport?
faq.answer: Light training resumes after two weeks; full strength work usually by week six with physio clearance.

faq.question: Will I need another injection?
faq.answer: Some patients benefit from a booster 3-4 months later. We track progress to advise.
